resources.string: Enter your license key to activate System Shield. You can find your license code on the platform you purchased it from or in your e-mail address. It must be communicated to you within 8 hours at the latest after the purchase is made.
License key is valid. System Shield is activated.
License key is invalid. Please check your license key.

The security system cannot warn you of virus threats because notification access is not allowed.\nActivate the notification permission to receive notifications of possible virus threats and to be protected from dangers.
System Shield scans your device for viruses and threats.\nIt also checks your privacy settings and warns you if there is a problem.
System Shield has scanned %1$d apps. You are safe. Nothing suspicious was found.
